page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE WHO DO DIFFERENT JOBS IN OUR BLOCK.I KNOW THERE ARE LADIES IN OUR BLOCK WHO DO SECRETARIAL WORK.MY MUM WORKS FOR FARMERS.SHE COUNTS THE ANIMALS,TYPES OUT LETTERS AND FILES IMPORTANT AND ORDINARY LETTERS.THERE ARE MANY FARMERS LIVING NEAR US,ALSO FARM WORKERS.THERE IS AN AIR TRAFFIC CONTROLLER IN OUR VILLAGE. HE MAKES UP PROGRAMS ON A COMPUTER TO HELP TEST AEROPLANES.A FAMILY RUNS A STALL IN A MARKET THEY SELL COATS,T SHIRTS WITH PICTURES OF CARTOON CHARACTERS ON THE FRONT AND BADGES .A CARPET LAYER FROM OUR VILLAGE LAYS LOTS OF CARPETS A YEAR.THERE ARE MANY NEW HOUSES GOING UP THAT'S BECAUSE THERE ARE MANY BUILDERS.TEN HOUSES ARE BEING MADE AT THE MOMENT THREE ARE ALREADY BUILT. ALTHOUGH MANY PEOPLE IN THIS COUNTRY ARE UNABLE TO WORK, MOST PEOPLE IN OUR AREA HAVE EMPLOYMENT.
